body_html:
in particular it is not clear how to convert torch.Tensor to torch.Size or the other way around.

Do you mean this:

Convert tensor to torch.Size:

t = torch.tensor([1, 2, 3], dtype=torch.int)
torch.Size(t.numpy())

Convert torch.Size to tensor:

s = torch.Size([1, 2, 3])
torch.tensor(s)
body_text:
in particular it is not clear how to convert torch.Tensor to torch.Size or the other way around.

Do you mean this:
Convert tensor to torch.Size:
t = torch.tensor([1, 2, 3], dtype=torch.int)
torch.Size(t.numpy())

Convert torch.Size to tensor:
s = torch.Size([1, 2, 3])
torch.tensor(s)
body:
> in particular it is not clear how to convert torch.Tensor to torch.Size or the other way around.

Do you mean this:

Convert tensor to torch.Size:

    t = torch.tensor([1, 2, 3], dtype=torch.int)
    torch.Size(t.numpy())


Convert torch.Size to tensor:

    s = torch.Size([1, 2, 3])
    torch.tensor(s)
